688530.name: World of Speed - Ford Mustang GT
688530.description:
Add an exclusive American Ford Mustang GT muscle car to your collection. In addition to the car, the DLC includes unique color scheme and a set of premium bonuses.

The fifth generation of the Ford Mustang GT is a charged version of the modern embodiment of the American muscle car. The design of the model is consistent with the line of classic Mustangs. The technical side of the car is represented by a powerful 8-cylinder engine and a high-tech suspension, assembled in an aerodynamically perfect body.

In World of Speed, the Ford Mustang GT is a collectible car of expert level. Powerful engine and classic rear-wheel drive layout provide excellent acceleration and speed on the tracks. The relatively high mass of the car requires care and skill, but at the same time gives an advantage in a tough contact race.

This collectible car is available exclusively as part of early access, it will not be possible to receive it after the full release of the game.

The DLC includes:
  • Ford Mustang GT collectible car
  • Unique color scheme
  • 15000 Credits (standard game currency)
  • 5000 Diamonds (premium game currency)
  • 60 days of Premium Account (an amount of received credits, experience and dealer reputation is increased to 150%)
688530.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
